The best way to use ComputeSDK

Pro is a paid version of ComputeSDK that includes everything you need to get started with ComputeSDK.

We built Pro to make it easy for you and your team to access all the tools you need to host our operator and easily access all the compute resources your app needs.

What is ComputeSDK Pro?

As our apps grow in complexity, we found that we needed more tools to make it easy for you and your team to access all the tools you need to host our operator and easily access all the compute resources your app needs. So we built the software we see needed for teams across industries, tech stacks, use cases, and organizations of all sizes.

Why ComputeSDK Pro?

Tools make teams more productive. If your team is building an app that uses compute, a tool that allows them to focus on the what while easily levarging a tool to assist with the how... you have the recipe for better result from an energized team.

Frequently asked questions

What is Compute SDK?

Compute SDK is a powerful framework that enables developers to build and deploy scalable, high-performance applications with ease. It provides a simple yet powerful API for handling complex computations and distributed systems.

How does the pricing work?

Our pricing is based on the resources you use. We offer flexible plans that scale with your needs, from small projects to enterprise-level applications. You only pay for what you use with no hidden fees.

Is there a free tier?

Yes! We offer a generous free tier that includes enough resources to get started and build small applications. You can upgrade at any time as your needs grow.

How do I get support?

We provide comprehensive documentation, community forums, and email support for all users. Enterprise plans include priority support with guaranteed response times.

annual subscription
$998

What's included?

  • The code (system requirements)
  • Easy installation (8-minute video)
  • Free updates to any 1.x version
  • Bare bones support included

How do we get it?

After you purchase, we'll email you a private download link that includes everything you need.

Please review all FAQs. before making a purchase. If you have more questions, feel free to contact us.
